description: Vector database for machine learning applications

pinecone_upsert_vector.description: Insert or update vectors in a Pinecone index

pinecone_get_vector.description: Retrieve a specific vector by ID from a Pinecone index

pinecone_update_vector.description: Update an existing vector in a Pinecone index

pinecone_delete_vector.description: Delete vectors from a Pinecone index

pinecone_search_vectors.description: Search for similar vectors in a Pinecone index

pinecone_search_index.description: Get statistics and information about a Pinecone index
